lead_paragraph: At least 60 percent of Deutsche Börse’s outstanding shares must be tendered for the deal to be successful, down from 75 percent.

headline.print_headline: Exchanges Ease Criteria for a Merger in Europe
headline.main: Deutsche Börse Lowers Threshold for London Stock Exchange Merger

snippet: At least 60 percent of Deutsche Börse’s outstanding shares must be tendered for the deal to be successful, down from 75 percent....
abstract: London Stock Exchange Group and Deutsche Borse, seeking to proceed with merger, announce they will lower acceptance threshold required from shareholders in German exchange in order to make it easier for index funds to participate in offer; will also extend by two weeks period for Deutsche Borse investors to accept stock exchange offer.
